resources.string: Allows you to connect usb drives. This only works once per boot, which means that once enabled, you can connected a drive as many times as you like. MTP and ADB are disabled. Once disabled, MTP and ADB work again but this can not be re-enabled until you reboot.
Displays the date and time on the offline charging screen.
Keeps the offline charging screen on.
Auto logcat enables automatic dumping of the log to a file in the root of the sdcard. Does not clean up after itself. Should probably keep this off unless I ask you to turn it on.
Auto kmsg enables automatic dumping of the kernel log to a file in the root of the sdcard. Does not clean up after itself. Should probably keep this off unless I ask you to turn it on.
Auto ril log enables automatic dumping of the Radio log to a file in the root of the sdcard. Does not clean up after itself. Should probably keep this off unless I ask you to turn it on.
